channel.title: Teleport error?
channel.description:
I am using Devolution 7, and don't have any clue as to where the teleports are located *as in...I can't find where to edit them*. I need to know where the ones are that show X Coord/Y Coord, and so on...
SOMEONE HELP ME PLZ!
I am f***ed without some help
Thanks.

item.title: Teleport error?
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Yes, you got to code them yourself, but luckily I’ve coded them in my server so i’ll give you them.

Open client.java and search for:

case 51023

Edit the last 3 to this:

case 51023: // text triggerTele(xcoord, ycoord, heightlevel, false); break; case 51031: // text triggerTele(xcoord, ycoord, heightlevel, false); break; case 51039: // text triggerTele(xcoord, ycoord, heightlevel, false); break;

Change them to where you want the Teleports to take you.

Example:

case 51023: // Ice Queen Teleport -Rich triggerTele(2866, 9949, 0, false); break;

Now Search up for:

Legends Guild Teleport

and Add this under it:

sendQuest("TeleportTopText", 13081); sendQuest("BottomText", 13082); sendQuest("@gre@0/0", 13085); sendQuest("@gre@0/0", 13086); sendQuest("TeleportTopText", 13089); sendQuest("BottomText", 13090); sendQuest("@gre@0/0", 13093); sendQuest("@gre@0/0", 13094); sendQuest("TeleportTopText", 13097); sendQuest("BottomText", 13098); sendQuest("@gre@0/0", 13101); sendQuest("@gre@0/0", 13102);

Example:

sendQuest("Ice Queen Teleport", 13081); sendQuest("Visit the Ice Queen's Lair", 13082); sendQuest("@gre@0/0", 13085); sendQuest("@gre@0/0", 13086);

Read full topic

item.title: Teleport error?
item.dc:creator: @Runer_King Runer King
item.description:
@Runer_King wrote:

Well, do you mean the last 3 teleports in the ancient magik book? because I can’t find them. (Devolution 7)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 24, 2007, 07:46:44 PM[/size][hr]I also tried adding Agility which worked fine for about 1 day. Then I get errors, and it’s the teleports…Not the agility, because I removed it, and it has the same errors.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Runer_King wrote:

`Rich:

Use Moparscape client with ::coordson to see your Coords, but if that’s not it, explain what you need help with more.

as in…I can’t find where to edit them

I am talking about my server files.
